section.name: Getting Help
section.p: If you have any questions about Hibernate Spatial, the best place to look are the mailing lists. The list Hibernatespatial-users is intended for users of Hibernate, and the most active. This list is also archived on Nabble (goto forum). To post messages to the list, you will need to register.
To submit bug reports, request new features, or suggest improvements you should use our issue management system.
